original_text: And Joab said unto the man that told him, And, behold, thou sawest him, and why didst thou not smite him there to the ground? and I would have given thee ten shekels of silver, and a girdle.
korean_text: 요압이 그 알린 사람에게 이르되 네가 보고 어찌하여 당장에 쳐서 땅에 떨어뜨리지 아니하였느냐 내가 네게 은 열 개와 띠 하나를 주었으리라 하는지라

sentences.original_text: unto the man that told him
and why didst thou not smite him there to the ground?
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 그를 거기서 땅에 쓰러뜨리지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: and I would have given thee ten shekels of silver
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 은 열 세겔을 네게 주었으리라
